content.text: Can you send me an email (john@doe.com) with weather information for Seattle?

arguments.subject: Seattle Weather Update
arguments.body:
Hello,

Here is the current weather information for Seattle:

Weather: Rainy
Temperature: 14Â°C

Stay dry!

Best regards.

content.text: The current weather in Seattle is rainy with a temperature of 14°C. I have sent this information to your email address (john@doe.com). If you need updates for any other location, let me know!

content.text: Find the longest word in each sentence: 'The quick brown fox', 'Jumped over the lazy dog'.
The longest word in the first sentence is "quick" and in the second sentence is "Jumped".
